attributes.action: reinstate the money from University budget cuts.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
University budgets are being cut by £449m, leading student places to be reduced by an estimated 6,000 in the next academic year.

This comes at a time when University applicants are at an all time high. Lots of intelligent, young minds are going to be denied their chance for an education. 
Its a short sighted attempt to save money that will only bring more damage to Englands economy long term.

http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/education/8491729.stm
